definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝是长江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: Developing the idle land in winter in Yangtze River basin for expanding the acreage of rape.
sentences.chinese: 大力开发长江流域冬闲田土，扩大油菜种植面积。

sentences.english: The great lakes along The Yangtze are also victims of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域五大湖也遭受旱灾的影响。

sentences.english: Ever since Song Dynasty, the Yangtze River basins has been the center of silk industry of China.
sentences.chinese: 自宋代以来，长江流域一直是我国丝绸业的重心。

sentences.english: During the first half of the 20th century, schistosomiasis was widespread in the Yangtze River Valley.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪上半期，血吸虫病泛滥于长江流域。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam project threatens many endangered species that are native to the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 三峡工程危及到了长江流域很多物种。

sentences.english: When the water arrives from the Yangzi basin, officials in Beijing and Hebei will breathe a little easier.
sentences.chinese: 当水从长江流域到来，北京和河北当局将松一口气。

sentences.english: During the Spring and Autumn period, in the Yangtze valley the confrontation appeared between Yue and Chu.
sentences.chinese: 春秋时期，长江流域山现越楚对峙的局面。

sentences.english: The cranes migrate 3, 100 miles tothe Yangtze region from their breeding ground in western Siberia.
sentences.chinese: 它们每年从西伯利亚西部的繁殖地迁徙到长江流域来。

sentences.english: Over the past decades, the Yangtze River Basin has become hotter.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的几十年中，长江流域变得更热。

sentences.english: The Yangtze River basin is the main source for water in the South-North Water Diversion Project.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域是南水北调工程的主要水源。

sentences.english: The IWRM in the Yangtze drainage basin is a scientific issue with multi-disciplinary characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域水资源综合管理是一个多学科的研究课题。

sentences.english: Therefore the monsoonal rainfall was suppressed in North China and enhanced in South China.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域和华南地区则相反，季风降水降水加强。

sentences.english: The red terrigenous sedimentary layers that are shortly called as red beds are extensively distributed in South China.
sentences.chinese: 我国红层主要分布于长江流域及其以南地区。

sentences.english: The favourable natural ecological condition is the material premise for the agricultural culture of the Yangtze basin.
sentences.chinese: 优越的自然生态条件是长江流域农业文化的物质前提。

sentences.english: The setting up of water gauges in the Yangtze River valley has a long History.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域设置水尺的历史悠久。

definition: Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]
Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
Hubei Province (Hupeh) in central China, abbr. 鄂[E4], capital Wuhan 武漢|武汉[Wu3 han4]
north/the northern part a country/China north of the Yellow River
south/the southern part of the country/the South
